about_the_game:
TEST A PREVIEW OF 30 FIRST LEVELS OF BALLISTIC ON ANDROID AND IPHONE!

and support the development of more levels & more robots!
(check our website for links)

A completely new take on beloved classic gameplay

Ballistic is a top-down roguelike casual game divided by level, with a completely new take on the gameplay invented by Breakout in 1976, and enhance later by other games like Arkanoid.

In Ballistic, you will be in control of Marble the robot, as you find your way and try to survive through the diabolical levels you were sent to.
But you will not be alone. You will find an ally in the form of an energy core to help you break your way out.




_______________________________________

F E A T U R E S

_______________________________________

Casual Gaming

With 25 Levels and 5 Bonus Levels to Explore

arcade Levels

Testing your reflex and ability to control the ball

Rogue Like Levels

Inviting you to explore to find goodies and extra powers.

Puzzle Levels

Challenging you to solve some fun puzzle

Customization

Including color, stickers, and trails to make it your own

Power up

You can buy on the fly to enhance Marble abilities.

Engaging Rewards

You get for collecting all the coins, destroying all blocks, or finishing the level under a specific time.

Passive Powers

More life, more energy to slow down time. Hyperspeed to break everything for a short time.

Great Replayability

With different objectives in each level, which once completed unlock exclusive bonus levels.

Imagine the 1976 Breakout but in 3D, with superpowers. Add levels filled with traps, enemies, puzzles, easter eggs, and hidden rooms then you will have an idea of what Ballistic is about
